original: Åkerblad, Sven Julius, kyrkoherde, Backaryd, f. 23/12/97 i Övraby, Hall. 1., av folkskoll. Sven Å. o. Sofia Jönsson. G. 29 m. Alma Elida Persson. Barn: Birgitta f. 30, Lena 34, Malin 37, Sven 43. — Stud:ex. i Lund 18, teol. fil. ex. där 24, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Lunds stift 26. Kyrko-adj. i Dalköpinge 29, kyrkoh. i Backaryd sed. 32. Ordf. i kyrkostämma o. skolstyr.
translated: Åkerblad, Sven Julius, vicar, Backaryd, b. 23/12/97 in Övraby, Halland, son of Sven Å. and Sofia Jönsson. Married on 29 to Alma Elida Persson. Children: Birgitta b. 30, Lena b. 34, Malin b. 37, Sven b. 43. — Studied at Lund University, graduated in 1918, obtained a degree in theology in 1924, completed practical theology exams and was ordained as a priest for the Diocese of Lund in 1926. Served as a church assistant in Dalköpinge from 1929, and as a vicar in Backaryd since 1932. Chairman of the church assembly and school board.
